description.db:para: Table for the domainpolicy module. More information at http://www.openser.org/docs/modules/1.2.x/domainpolicy.html.

column.name: rule
column.description: Domain policy rule name which is equal to the URI as published in the domain policy NAPTRs.

column.name: type
column.description: Domain policy rule type. In the case of federation names, this is “fed”. For standard referrals according to draft-lendl-speermint-technical-policy-00, this is “std”. For direct domain lookups, this is “dom”. Default value is “type”.

column.name: att
column.description: It contains the AVP’s name. If the rule stored in this row triggers, than dp_can_connect() will add an AVP with that name.

column.name: val
column.description: It contains the values for AVPs created by dp_can_connect(). Default value is “val”
